meanings.definition: Mezcals: a distilled alcoholic beverage made from the agave plant, typically produced in Mexico.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they served different mezcals for everyone to taste.
meanings.sent2: The bartender recommended trying various mezcals to experience different flavors.
meanings.sent3: The mezcals at the bar were so popular that they ran out before midnight.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the mezcals filled the room, creating a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The colorful labels on the mezcals made them stand out on the shelf.

meanings.definition: Mezcals: plural form of mezcal, referring to multiple bottles or types of the alcoholic beverage.
meanings.sent1: She bought three mezcals from the store to add to her collection.
meanings.sent2: The mezcals on the shelf gleamed under the bright lights of the liquor store.
meanings.sent3: Carrying all the mezcals home was a challenge, but she managed with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The mezcals lined up on the counter like soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The variety of mezcals available was overwhelming, but she enjoyed the selection process.
